title: Fiji Beachfront Escape with Dining Inclusions
description: The aquamarine waters, colorful coral reefs and pristine white beaches of Fiji are calling: answer in style, staying in a prime beachfront location at The Pearl Resort, an elegant resort nestled between Suva and Nadi on the south coast of the island, in Pacific Harbour. Set your watch to island time and unwind in a Premium Garden Room situated in the NEW wing of the resort. Enjoy daily buffet breakfast, a house cocktail per person, a two-course lunch and three-course dinner, a 30-minute massage per person, return private airport transfers and complimentary Wi-Fi throughout your stay.

title: The Pearl Resort Fiji - JUL 25
offer_address: Queens Road, Deuba, Pacific Harbour, Fiji

title: Idyllic Fiji Beachfront Escape with All-Inclusive Dining & Direct Access to One of the Island's Premier Beaches
description:
Head to the golden sun and sands of the tropics - you'll find The Pearl Resort wedged in its very own little triangle of direct beachfront bliss, sitting pretty in a pristine corner of Pacific Harbour, the adventure capital of Fiji. Access to one of the island's longest white-sand beaches, two inviting lagoon pools and a ring of luxurious palms make this island retreat a bona fide paradise. Soak up the sunset from the swim-up bar, gazing over the crystal-clear waters of Rovodrau Bay, or lose yourself to complete bliss during a traditional, relaxing massage at the onsite spa.

Take advantage of all-inclusive indulgence, dining three times a day on local and international delicacies prepared with the finest produce at Riviera Restaurant & Bar. Spend balmy days laid up beachside or venture further inland to see Fiji's unspoiled wilderness while white-water rafting, island hopping and diving through coral reefs. Adventure and relaxation await you, as much or as little as you desire.
offer_address: Queens Road, Deuba, Pacific Harbour, Fiji

title: All-Inclusive Fiji Island Bliss with Direct Beach Access & Daily Free-Flow Drinks
description:
Head to the golden sun and sands of the tropics, where you'll find this dreamy resort wedged in its own little triangle of beachfront bliss, sitting pretty in a pristine corner of the adventure capital of Fiji.

Access to one of the island's longest beaches, two inviting lagoon pools and a ring of luxurious palms make this island retreat a bona fide paradise. Soak up the sunset from the bar, gazing over the crystal-clear waters of Beqa Lagoon, or lose yourself to complete bliss during a traditional, relaxing massage at the onsite spa.

Take advantage of all-inclusive indulgence, dining three times daily on local and international delicacies prepared with the finest produce at Riviera Restaurant & Bar. Stop by the Pool Bar or Deli Restaurant to kick back with refreshing free-flow drinks, spend balmy days laid up beachside or venture further inland to see Fiji's unspoiled wilderness.
offer_address: Queens Road, Deuba, Pacific Harbour, Fiji

title: Fiji Pacific Harbour Retreat with All-Inclusive Dining & Direct Access to One of the Island's Longest Beaches
description:
Immerse yourself in this pristine corner of the aquamarine Pacific Ocean between Nadi and Suva, wedged between the resort and its very own little triangle of direct beachfront bliss at The Pearl Resort. Access to one of the island's longest beaches, two inviting lagoon pools and a ring of luxurious palms make this Pacific Harbour retreat a bona fide paradise. Take refuge casting a fishing line off the rocks, kayaking on the tranquil Qaraniqio River, which leads to the glistening South Pacific, or snorkelling off the beachfront.

Head over to the impressive 18-hole golf course, designed by Robert Trent Jones Junior and considered one of Fiji's most adventurous courses, or indulge in local and international delicacies prepared with the finest local produce at Riviera Restaurant & Bar.
offer_address: Queens Road, Deuba, Pacific Harbour, Fiji

title: Fiji Pacific Harbour Beachfront Retreat with All-Inclusive Dining & Waterfall Trip
description:
The aquamarine waters, colourful coral reefs and pristine white beaches of Fiji's Pacific Harbour promise an enchanting escape like no other at The Pearl Resort. Perfectly positioned in Pacific Harbour, the adventure capital of Fiji, the resort's direct access to one of the island's longest beaches promises days filled with fishing, kayaking or snorkelling. Or, if it's relaxation you seek, bliss out at the waterside spa or simply kick back and soak up the sunset from the swim-up bar.

Spend days casting a fishing line off the rocks, kayaking on the tranquil Qaraniqio River, which leads to the glistening South Pacific, or snorkelling off the beachfront. Head over to the impressive 18-hole golf course, designed by mastermind Robert Trent Jones Junior and considered one of Fiji's most adventurous courses, or indulge in local and international delicacies prepared with the finest local produce at the Riviera Restaurant & Bar.
offer_address: Queens Road, Deuba, Pacific Harbour, Fiji

title: Fiji Pacific Harbour Beachfront Retreat with All-Inclusive Dining, Waterfall Trip & Roundtrip International Flights with Fiji Airways for Two Adults
description:
The aquamarine waters, colourful coral reefs and pristine white beaches of Fiji's Pacific Harbour promise an enchanting escape like no other at The Pearl Resort. Hidden on one of the island's longest beaches, where you can glimpse the sunrise and soak up the sunset from the pool-up bar, this romantic oasis is nestled between Suva and Nadi on the south coast. Set your watch to island time and unwind on Fijiâ€™s palm tree-speckled shores, providing an idyllic backdrop for those looking to discover absolute relaxation.

Spend days casting a fishing line off the rocks, kayaking on the tranquil Qaraniqio River which leads to the glistening South Pacific, or snorkelling off the beachfront. There's also a day spa for moments of relaxation, an adults-only infinity pool, an 18-hole golf course and paid excursions to Yanuca Island or Colo-i-Suva. Service with a smile goes without saying in Fiji. Whatever you desire, whether it's feeding sharks just off the coast, jet-skiing through Fiji's bright blue waters, or embarking on a rafting adventure through lush forest, it's all possible from The Pearl Resort.
offer_address: Queens Road, Deuba, Pacific Harbour, Fiji
